LanguageData.Apparel_WolfArmor.label: Wolf Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_WolfArmor.description: Armor plates covering the body. Protects against gunfire and melee attacks. (Wolf: Artic, Timber)

LanguageData.Apparel_BearArmor.description: Armor plates covering the body. Protects against gunfire and melee attacks. (Bears: Grizzly, Polar)

LanguageData.Apparel_BoarArmor.description: Armor plates covering the body. Protects against gunfire and melee attacks.
LanguageData.Apparel_DogArmorVest.label: dog armor vest
LanguageData.Apparel_DogArmorVest.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. Protects against gunfire. (Dogs: Husky, Labrador Retriever, Mod: FF German Shepherd, Mod: Spidercamps Dogs: Caucasian Shepherd)
LanguageData.Apparel_CatArmor.label: Cat Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_CatArmor.description: Armor plates covering the body. Protects against gunfire and melee attacks.

LanguageData.Apparel_WargArmor.description: Leather with armor covering the body. Protects against gunfire and melee attacks.
LanguageData.Apparel_Howdah.label: Elephant Howdah
LanguageData.Apparel_Howdah.description: A Howdah is designed to carry people on the back of an elephant.
LanguageData.Apparel_DogScarf.label: Dog Scarf
LanguageData.Apparel_DogScarf.description: A stylish accessory for dogs. (Dogs: Yorkshire Terrier, Husky, Labrador Retriever, Arctic/Timber Wolf, Warg)
LanguageData.Apparel_FoxBandana.label: Fox Bandana

LanguageData.Apparel_DogGambeson.description: A padded jacket protecting in combat and cold weather. (Dogs: Husky)

LanguageData.Apparel_ThrumboArmor.description: Armor plates covering the body. Protects against gunfire and melee attacks.
